sentences.english: Sure, they’ve closed businesses, lost clients, and left relationships.
sentences.chinese: 当然，他们的企业倒闭，客户流失或众叛亲离。

sentences.english: The magnate was murdered at a gathering of relatives and friends.
sentences.chinese: 生前众叛亲离的富豪在亲友聚会中遇害。

sentences.english: Walking also to face that eventually the face of destitute.
sentences.chinese: 最终走来竟也是要面临众叛亲离的面貌。

sentences.english: His behavior will make him utterly isolated.
sentences.chinese: 他的行为将导致众叛亲离。

sentences.english: Such people can only end up being left alone.
sentences.chinese: 这种人最后只能是众叛亲离。

sentences.english: A friend is the first person who comes in when the whole world has gone out.
sentences.chinese: 朋友是在众叛亲离时，第一个伸出援手的人。

sentences.english: After all, she had betrayed those closest to her to save Theseus.
sentences.chinese: 毕竟，为了救忒修斯，她不惜众叛亲离。
